newsitem.title: JAPAN: TOCOM rubber ends mostly down in bearish sentiment.
newsitem.headline: TOCOM rubber ends mostly down in bearish sentiment.

text.p: Tokyo rubber futures ended mostly weaker except for the spot July contract in continued bearish sentiment, Japanese traders said on Monday.
Expectations that overseas prices will be weaker on rising output and poor demand in summer, also dampened sentiment.
Prices ranged from 2.2 yen per kg lower to 0.6 yen up. Benchmark December was off 2.2 yen at 119.8 yen.

"Bearish sentiment remains intact," an analyst at a commodity broker said. "Although some bargain-hunting was detected after the benchmark December broke under 120 yen, the market lacked factors to push up prices," he said.
